titles.title: My glory and the lifter of my head,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My glory and the lifter of my head,
My glory and the lifter of my head,
And Thou, O Lord, art a shield to me,
My glory and the lifter of my head.
I cried unto the Lord with my voice,
I cried unto the Lord with my voice,
I cried unto the Lord with my voice,
And He heard me out of His holy hill:
